title: Stemplot Comparison
question_text:
Students in the day and evening classes of a statistics course at a local university were given the same test. Below are back-to-back stemplots for the test results from the two classes.
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.

Key: 8|2|0 - 28 and 20
What can be said about the scores for these two groups of students?

choices.text: The distribution of grades for the day students is highly skewed toward the right.

The median for each of the distributions is a grade in the 60
â€™s.
The mean, median, and mode for the evening students is higher than it is for the day students.
The grades for the evening students appear to be approximately normally distributed, while the grades for the day students appear to be skewed to the left.
The range of scores for the day students is higher than it is for the evening students.
